desc.en: Sensei resumes patrolling with Sena, and they run into Chihiro. Fubuki and Kirino are transporting Wakamo to the Corrections Bureau. Wakamo escapes from the transport truck amidst all the talk of Wakamo's terrifying reputation as the "Fox of Calamity".
desc.jp: Sensei resumes patrolling with Sena, and they run into Chihiro. Fubuki and Kirino are transporting Wakamo to the Corrections Bureau. Wakamo escapes from the transport truck amidst all the talk of Wakamo's terrifying reputation as the "Fox of Calamity".
desc.zh_cn: 继续四处巡逻的老师和{cf瀬奈}，恰巧碰见了前来检查保全设备的{cf千寻}。与此同时，{cf吹雪}和{cf桐乃}正准备将{cf若藻}移送至矫正局。就在{cf吹雪}和{cf桐乃}热烈讨论被称为「灾厄之狐」的{cf若藻}有多么可怕时，{cf若藻}不费吹灰之力便逃出了囚车。

long.jp: ゲヘナ学園
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ヴァルキューレ警察学校
ヴァルキューレ警察学校

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: 百鬼夜行連合学院

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
狐坂{cf若藻}的沉默与祝宴

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

name.zh_cn: 狐坂{cf若藻}的沉默与祝宴

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

desc.en: Sensei manages to recapture Wakamo, who is wreaking havoc using Valkyrie Police School's equipment. Chihiro is shocked at how they lost control of their equipment, but Fubuki and Kirino shrug it off and take custody of Wakamo, saying it won't happen again.
desc.jp: Sensei manages to recapture Wakamo, who is wreaking havoc using Valkyrie Police School's equipment. Chihiro is shocked at how they lost control of their equipment, but Fubuki and Kirino shrug it off and take custody of Wakamo, saying it won't happen again.
desc.zh_cn: 尽管{cf若藻}利用{sn女武神}警察学园的装备在庆典中制造骚动，但老师很快便再次成功制伏了她。虽然{cf千寻}对于装备被偷的事感到相当傻眼，但{cf吹雪}却向她再三保证不会让这种事再度发生，两人一起和{cf桐乃}再次将{cf若藻}押上了囚车。

long.jp: ヴァルキューレ警察学校
ヴァルキューレ警察学校

{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

desc.en: The Valkyrie Police School students begin interrogating Wakamo after escorting her to the Corrections Bureau. Unbothered, Wakamo says that she has a plan of her own and breaks out of the Corrections Bureau.
desc.jp: The Valkyrie Police School students begin interrogating Wakamo after escorting her to the Corrections Bureau. Unbothered, Wakamo says that she has a plan of her own and breaks out of the Corrections Bureau.
desc.zh_cn: 顺利将{cf若藻}押送至矫正局后，{sn女武神}警察学园的学生们便开始对{cf若藻}进行审问。没想到，{cf若藻}根本不把{sn女武神}警察学园放在眼里，只告诉她们自己还有要事要办后就擅自逃离了矫正局。

long.jp: 百鬼夜行連合学院
ヴァルキューレ警察学校

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Sensei once again succeeds in capturing Wakamo. Fubuki blames the incident on the Corrections Bureau's outdated facilities and shrugs it off as she takes custody of Wakamo once more.
desc.jp: Sensei once again succeeds in capturing Wakamo. Fubuki blames the incident on the Corrections Bureau's outdated facilities and shrugs it off as she takes custody of Wakamo once more.
desc.zh_cn: 老师再次抓住了{cf若藻}。{cf吹雪}辩称{cf若藻}之所以能够逃脱，全都要怪矫正局的设施太过老旧。重申不会让这种事再度发生后，{cf吹雪}便将{cf若藻}押送回矫正局。

desc.en: Wakamo is escorted back to the Corrections Bureau, and the Valkyrie Police School students try to coax Wakamo by using oyakodon. Wakamo marvels at the absurdity as she escapes once again.
desc.jp: Wakamo is escorted back to the Corrections Bureau, and the Valkyrie Police School students try to coax Wakamo by using oyakodon. Wakamo marvels at the absurdity as she escapes once again.
desc.zh_cn: 再次将{cf若藻}押送回矫正局后，{sn女武神}警察学园的学生们尝试用亲子丼诱劝{cf若藻}开口，然而对亲子丼不屑一顾的{cf若藻}却很快便再次逃出了矫正局。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?

伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

desc.en: Wakamo is captured by Sensei again. Fubuki and Kirino marvel that Wakamo truly lives up to her reputation as a terrifying criminal. However, they reassure everyone that dinner that night will be buckwheat soba as they take Wakamo into custody again.
desc.jp: Wakamo is captured by Sensei again. Fubuki and Kirino marvel that Wakamo truly lives up to her reputation as a terrifying criminal. However, they reassure everyone that dinner that night will be buckwheat soba as they take Wakamo into custody again.
desc.zh_cn: 一如既往地，老师再次抓住了{cf若藻}。{cf吹雪}和{cf桐乃}讶异{cf若藻}竟然能用亲子丼逃狱，认为{cf若藻}果然是传说级罪犯，非常可怕。但她们还是以晚餐是荞麦面让大家放心，再次{cf若藻}押送回矫正局。

long.jp: ヴァルキューレ警察学校
ヴァルキューレ警察学校

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

狐坂{cf若藻}的沉默与祝宴

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

name.zh_cn: 狐坂{cf若藻}的沉默与祝宴

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

desc.en: The Valkyrie Police School students are determined to find out what Wakamo's plans are once and for all, but Wakamo is already long gone.
desc.jp: The Valkyrie Police School students are determined to find out what Wakamo's plans are once and for all, but Wakamo is already long gone.
desc.zh_cn: 就在{sn女武神}警察学园的学生们发誓一定要让{cf若藻}说出她的真实目的时，{cf若藻}早已神不知鬼不觉地再次逃出了矫正局。

long.jp: ゲヘナ学園
ヴァルキューレ警察学校
百鬼夜行連合学院

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Sensei demands to know what's going on after recapturing Wakamo for the umpteenth time. Flustered, Fubuki and Kirino promise that this won't happen again and hurriedly escort Wakamo away.
desc.jp: Sensei demands to know what's going on after recapturing Wakamo for the umpteenth time. Flustered, Fubuki and Kirino promise that this won't happen again and hurriedly escort Wakamo away.
desc.zh_cn: 在不知道是第几次成功制服{cf若藻}后，老师终于忍不住质问起{cf吹雪}和{cf桐乃}，她们两人表示真的不会再让这种事情发生，并且慌慌张张地将{cf若藻}再次押送回矫正局。

long.jp: ヴァルキューレ警察学校
ヴァルキューレ警察学校

{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

desc.en: The townspeople present Sensei with a thank-you gift during a patrol. Sensei is taken aback, but Sena tells Sensei that she is also truly thankful for all they've done in the past year. The two then receive word that Wakamo has escaped yet again.
desc.jp: The townspeople present Sensei with a thank-you gift during a patrol. Sensei is taken aback, but Sena tells Sensei that she is also truly thankful for all they've done in the past year. The two then receive word that Wakamo has escaped yet again.
desc.zh_cn: 重新开始运行巡逻工作后，居民们为了感谢{et夏莱}的老师对奇普托斯的付出送上了礼物。老师感到不知所措，但{cf瀬奈}说这是居民对于自己与老师过去一年的付出所送上的谢礼，那份感激也是他们的真心。就在这温馨的时刻，两人接到{cf若藻}再次逃狱的消息。

long.jp: ゲヘナ学園
ヴァルキューレ警察学校

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?

伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

desc.en: Wakamo is once again recaptured. Chihiro demands responsibility for the string of escapes, but Fubuki maintains that things are under control and calls in Yuuka, Hasumi, Suzumi, and Chinatsu. Fubuki takes Wakamo away, insisting things will be fine thanks to their previous history with Wakamo.
desc.jp: Wakamo is once again recaptured. Chihiro demands responsibility for the string of escapes, but Fubuki maintains that things are under control and calls in Yuuka, Hasumi, Suzumi, and Chinatsu. Fubuki takes Wakamo away, insisting things will be fine thanks to their previous history with Wakamo.
desc.zh_cn: 尽管{cf若藻}很快便再度落网，但{cf千寻}在追究责任时，{cf吹雪}说着这次真的没事，并赶忙找来{cf优香}、{cf莲实}、{cf铃美}和{cf千夏}。由于有曾经和{cf若藻}交手过的帮手们协助押送，{cf吹雪}要众人尽管放一百万个心，继续押送{cf若藻}。

long.jp: 百鬼夜行連合学院
ゲヘナ学園

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

name.zh_cn: 狐坂{cf若藻}的沉默与祝宴

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

desc.en: Fubuki is confident that Wakamo won't be able to escape this time. It hits her that all of this was Wakamo's trap all along when Wakamo gets picked up on CCTV at the scene of the festival.
desc.jp: Fubuki is confident that Wakamo won't be able to escape this time. It hits her that all of this was Wakamo's trap all along when Wakamo gets picked up on CCTV at the scene of the festival.
desc.zh_cn: 虽然{cf吹雪}自信满满地向{cf若藻}表示自己绝不会再让她逃走，但当{cf吹雪}见到本该待在矫正局的{cf若藻}出现在庆典现场的监视器画面上时，{cf吹雪}才意识到这一切都是{cf若藻}的陷阱。

long.jp: ヴァルキューレ警察学校

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第101首曲子，在最终篇第三章占领方舟的活动战斗任务里使用。

name.zh_cn: 狐坂{cf若藻}的沉默与祝宴

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

desc.en: Against all odds, Wakamo manages to clear all obstacles in her way and finally comes face-to-face with Sensei. Sensei braces for an attack, but it turns out that Wakamo's plan all along was to present Sensei with Valentine's Day chocolates.
desc.jp: Against all odds, Wakamo manages to clear all obstacles in her way and finally comes face-to-face with Sensei. Sensei braces for an attack, but it turns out that Wakamo's plan all along was to present Sensei with Valentine's Day chocolates.
desc.zh_cn: {cf若藻}越过了试图阻挠她的无数障碍，并且再次来到了老师的面前。就在老师做好即将被{cf若藻}大卸八块的觉悟时，他才得知{cf若藻}从一开始就只是为了将情人节巧克力拿给他，才会不惜一次又一次接近他。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）
